15 /*
16  \class SBOSSAgent
17  \author Castronovo Michael
18 
19  \brief A RL Agent following a SBOSS policy.
20  It has been designed to address:
21  - DISCRETE state space (int)
22  - DISCRETE action space (int)
23  - SINGLE reward (double)
24 
25  (based on Guez work)
26 
27  \date 2015-03-17
28 */
29 // ===========================================================================
